recipesJson.name: TFA Grape Juice (FlavorBook Entry Recipe)
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
A vivid and pleasant Grape Juice recipe
Recipe made for TFA Grape Juice FlavorBook entry 
-> http://diyordievaping.com/2017/06/06/tfa-grape-juice/

reviews.text: If you are looking for a grape juice type vape, look no further.  I just vaped 60ml of this in a week and made up another 60.  This is going into my rotation for sure.
Samurichickon Does the LA grape have colouring in it?
I just mixed this up, is it supposed to be a really dark purple?
